description: Stepping into the backcountry for a multiday backpack trip or ambitious hike requires commitment and trust. The quick-dry Gamma is ready for whatever comes. The high-performance TerraTex™ stretch nylon is wind resistant, durable, and dries fast. The trim fit’s articulated patterning frees you to move, the adjustable waist belt rides comfortably under a pack, and five zippered pockets – including one at each thigh – are accessible and secure.
name: Arcteryx Gamma Quick Dry Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: TerraTex™ stretch woven with DWR - 94% Nylon, 6% Elastane
